Class MovieDatabase

  • java.lang.Object
    • MovieDatabase

  • public class MovieDatabase
extends java.lang.Object
    Project #2 CS 2334, Section 011 Feb 26, 2016

    Maintains the list of all shows and movies. Enabling the program to parse and add shows and search for them

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.util.ArrayList<Show> mDb
      List containing all the movies and TV shows

      • readShowsIntoDB

        private java.util.ArrayList<Show> readShowsIntoDB(java.lang.String file,
                                                  boolean isMovie)
                                           throws java.io.IOException
        Takes file of movies, parses them, and add them to database
        Parameters:
        file - Name of File containing shows
        isMovie - true if file contains movies, false if file containing TV
        Throws:
        FileNotFoundException
        java.io.IOException

      • searchFiles

        public java.util.ArrayList<Show> searchFiles(boolean movies,
                                             boolean tv,
                                             boolean episodes,
                                             boolean exactMatch,
                                             boolean sortByTitle,
                                             java.lang.String title,
                                             java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> years)
        Search database for specific shows
        Parameters:
        movies - Search for movies?
        tv - Search for TV shows?
        episodes - Search for specific episodes? (Can't be true if tv is false)
        exactMatch - Only allow if title exactly matches search
        sortByTitle - Sort by title (if true) or by year (if false)
        title - Title to search for. "'-1'" will be if any
        years - Years to search for. "-1" will be in first index if any
        Returns:

        Returns:
